sourcesContent:
import { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { listarComentarios } from '../../../api/comentariosAPI' import { AuthContext } from '../../../App' import '../PaginaPrincipal/PaginaPrincipal.css' export function Postagem(props) { const {auth} = useContext(AuthContext) const [comentarios, setComentarios] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { listarComentarios(auth.token).then( (response) => { setComentarios(response.data) } ).catch( (error => { console.log(error) }) ) },[]) return (
{props.usuario}

{props.texto}

{props.qtdLikes} likes
Ana

Tenho que concordar.

) } export default Postagem
